name: On Knowledge Base navigate to view documents and verify add New Documents Tag Icon Present and functional

testSteps.description: 1: On Knowledge Base navigate to view documents and verify add New Documents Tag Icon Present and functional ({menuItem=knowledge base, subMenuItem=view document, targetElement=add New Document, addButton=addButtonOnTag, close=closeButton, cross=crossIcon})

children.description: Given Verify beta-mis is open and loaded successfully.
When User logins into application with username "arpit.mishra" and password "Gemini@123"
Then Verify beta-mis Dashboard page opens
When Goto "knowledge base" and click on "view document"
Then verify no records added in the grid
Then verify no records added in the grid
Then click on ok button on warning popup
Then verify no records added in the grid
